name: ontime
description: Ontime is a self-hosted time tracking and visualization tool. It logs work sessions, generates reports, and provides a simple UI for freelancers or small teams to manage time and productivity.
features: Time tracking: Log work sessions with start and stop times for accurate recording of billable hours.
Project organization: Categorize time entries by project, client, or task for structured time management.
Reporting tools: Generate summaries of hours worked by period, project, or team member for billing and analysis.
Timer interface: Start and stop timers with one click to capture time as you work without manual entry.
Manual entries: Add time retroactively for work completed when the timer wasn't running.
Export data: Download time reports as CSV or PDF for invoicing, payroll, or client reporting.
Team tracking: Monitor time logged by multiple users for project management and capacity planning.
Visualization: View time distribution with charts and graphs to identify patterns and optimize productivity.
